name: ClassMarker
short_description:
ClassMarker is an online testing website facilitating and grading online exams
for a vast range of global customers.
long_description:
ClassMarker is a free online testing website which allows, teachers and
businesses to add their own tests online and have their users take them.
ClassMarker can be used with a class environment where students are registered
with Classmarker and log into a class to do their tests, or ClassMarker has
rebranded quizzes which allows test makers to rebranded and add their own logs
and colors to the quiz page and send a unique link to the quiz, with no need for
anyone to have to register or log in to take the test. Rebranded quizzes leaves
users with the feeling they are using the 'test authors' website instead of
ClassMarker. ClassMarker has free and upgraded options which give extra features
like emailing results to 'test authors' and in depth statistics or user and
group results.
